metadata.description: Being the only survivor from a tragic accident made Daisuke depended on human's touch whenever he sleeps. But the notorious player won't ever take the person he slept with as a lover. One day, Daisuke met with his best friend's little brother, Riku, whose cuteness strike him in the eyes. His usual approach couldn't win Riku's heart who has his own complexity towards his feminine look. Will they ever be able to heal themselves from the guilt?
metadata.name: Survivor Guilt: A Player's Love (Yaoi Manga)
